verses.name: Psalms 81:1
verses.text: Sing aloud unto God our strength: make a joyful noise unto the God of Jacob.

verses.name: Psalms 81:2
verses.text: Take a psalm, and bring hither the timbrel, the pleasant harp with the psaltery.

verses.name: Psalms 81:3
verses.text: Blow up the trumpet in the new moon, in the time appointed, on our solemn feast day.

verses.name: Psalms 81:4
verses.text: For this was a statute for Israel, and a law of the God of Jacob.

verses.name: Psalms 81:5
verses.text: This he ordained in Joseph for a testimony, when he went out through the land of Egypt: where I heard a language that I understood not.
